attributes.action: make it law to equal news coverage by the same space if events/disasters/stories reverse or change substantially
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am fed up with reading articles in papers such as the recent stock market volitiity having a one day slide of over 200 points and the daily mail giving a gloomy front page coverage explanation including petrol, gas, electric etc going up, house prices going down. on the day after the market virtually gained the same amount or if petrol etc prices come down the papers do not tell you that on the same coverage resulting in a depressed nation.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
